name: Trebbia's Survivor
description:
Trebbia's Survivor

Trebbia's valley, 218 AV JC
Hannibal has crossed the Alps with his elephants and his army.

Avoid all enemies by hiding and going quickly from place to place with directional key or WASD, jump with space.

Resistance is meaningless.
You can not rewrite history.

Art :
Anthony Mas 

Code : 
Luca Floreau
Simon Guggisberg
